oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum radio spots
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of advertisement radio spots for the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum, featuring Charlie Louvin (performer), Mary Taylor (performer), Jay Lee Webb (performer) and Nat Stuckey (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Charlie Louvin advertises Nashville, the Grand Ole Opry, and Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum as a vacation destination -- Mary Taylor advertises Nashville and the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum as a vacation destination -- Jay Lee Webb advertises Nashville and the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum as a vacation destination -- Nat Stuckey advertises Nashville and the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum as a vacation destination
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.); Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011; Webb, Jay Lee; Stuckey, Nat;
